data.oai_dc:dc: Table S2. Spawning decisions of wild type females and F1 females

Table S2 contains a summary of the spawning decisions of all wild type females and F1 hybrid females1-32 is the experimental round and each round may include more than one spawning decision per female.Species:p = P. sp. "pundamilia like"n = P. sp. "nyererei-like"pn = F1 hybrid between female P. sp. "pundamilia like" and male P. sp. "nyererei-like"np = F1 hybrid between female P. sp. "nyererei-like" and male P. sp. "pundamilia like"0 = spawning decision with P. sp. "pundamilia-like"1 = spawning decision with P. sp. "nyererei-like"
